rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster to ensure it can move freely.

wipe_caster.description: Clean the caster to remove dust or any foreign particles.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to ensure it can move freely.

wipe_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to remove dust or any foreign particles.

wipe_seat.description: Clean the seat to remove dust or any foreign particles.

check_chair_leg.description: Check the chair leg to ensure stability.

wipe_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to remove dust or any foreign particles.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.
